FOSSEE/scilab_case_study_hackathon.summary: The repository witnessed significant activity with multiple push events occurring on December 24 and 27, including updates to the Home page, problem-statement, evaluation, and resources page. Additionally, new logos were added and a pull request was merged. The content was also updated with meta keywords and date information.

FOSSEE/Common-Interface-Project.summary: Recent activities in the repository include push events with code cleanup for simplicity, updates to ExplicitLink for resolving differences between y values, and changes to xsl files for geometry point values. Pull requests were also merged, including updates to the xmlparser file and xsl files, along with changes to the exit code and Switch code.

FOSSEE/fossee-banners.summary: The repository saw recent activity with push events, including the addition of a new banner for the scilab hackathon, adjustments to the first image of a banner, and updates to the link of a banner. A pull request was also merged, adding a new banner for the scilab hackathon.

FOSSEE/certificate-generator.summary: A recent push event added Arduino Workshop Certificates to the repository, indicating ongoing development and updates to the certificate generator.

FOSSEE/scilab_case_study_portal.summary: A push event occurred on December 24, where a description was added under the project title, providing more context and information about the portal.
